verbose_text: Almeida et al. found that H 2 O 2 stimulates PKCbeta / p66 Shc / NF-kappaB signaling to apoptosis in osteoblastic cells, and that E2 prevents H 2 O 2 -dependent activation of p66 Shc and NF-kappaB via repressing phosphorylation of PKCbeta, resulting in protection from cell death [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NF-kappaB via repressing phosphorylation of PKCbeta
